cards.question: What is a Docker image?
cards.answer_textbook: A blueprint for containers — a read-only template with everything needed to run an app.
cards.answer_metaphor: A frozen pizza box — prepped and ready; bake as many pizzas (containers) as you want.
cards.answer_realworld: `docker build` locks the app version, libraries, and OS layer. Teams share images so dev/QA/prod run the exact same thing.

cards.question: What is a Docker container?
cards.answer_textbook: A running instance of an image...
cards.answer_metaphor: The pizza once it’s baked and served...
cards.answer_realworld: Start a container, run the app, test something...
